select * from `stock`, `product` where stock.stock_productid = product.product_id and stock.stock_type = 1
and product.product_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and product.product_id like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY `stock`.stock_id DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `stock`, `product` where stock.stock_productid = product.product_id and stock_type = 1 and stock_del = 0
and product.product_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and product.product_id like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

select * from `partner`
where partner_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

select sale.sale_productid, sale.sale_branchid, sum(sale_amount) sale_amount, sum(sale_sum) sale_sum, sale.sale_date, product.product_name, product.product_price, partner.partner_name from sale, branch, partner, product where sale_branchid = #{sale_branchid} and date(sale.sale_date) = #{sale_date} and sale.sale_branchid = branch.branch_id and sale.sale_productid = product.product_id and product.product_partnerid = partner.partner_id group by sale.sale_productid, sale.sale_branchid, sale.sale_date
select order_type, order_status, count(order_id) as count from `order` where order_type = 0 group by order_status, order_type;

select sale.sale_productid, sum(sale.sale_amount) as count, product.product_name, product.product_image, product.product_price, product.product_image from sale, product where sale.sale_productid = product.product_id group by sale_productid order by count desc;

SELECT FLOOR(SUM(sale_sum) / (SELECT COUNT(branch_code) FROM branch)) AS sale_sum, MONTH(sale_date) AS sale_month, YEAR(sale_date) AS sale_year FROM sale GROUP BY YEAR(sale_date), MONTH(sale_date) ORDER BY sale_year DESC, sale_month DESC LIMIT 6;

SELECT SUM(sale_sum) AS sale_sum, MONTH(sale_date) AS sale_month, YEAR(sale_date) AS sale_year, sale.sale_branchid, branch.branch_name FROM sale JOIN branch ON sale.sale_branchid = branch.branch_id WHERE YEAR(sale_date) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(sale_date) = MONTH(NOW()) GROUP BY YEAR(sale_date), MONTH(sale_date), sale_branchid, branch.branch_name ORDER BY sale_sum DESC

SELECT * FROM partner WHERE 1=1
AND partner_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partner_name}, '%')
AND partner_manager LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partner_manager}, '%')
AND partner_email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partner_email}, '%')
AND partner_phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partner_phone}, '%')

SELECT * FROM quotation WHERE 1=1
AND quotation_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{quotation_id}, '%')
AND quotation_partnername LIKE CONCAT('%', #{quotation_partnername}, '%')
AND quotation_hqmanager LIKE CONCAT('%', #{quotation_hqmanager}, '%')
AND DATE(quotation_date) >= #{startDate}
AND DATE(quotation_date) <= #{endDate}
AND quotation_status =
0 1 2
ORDER BY quotation_date DESC

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hr WHERE hr_authority = #{hr_authority} + 1 OR (#{hr_authority} = 7 AND hr_authority in (6,7));
SELECT * FROM hr WHERE hr_name like concat('%',#{hr_name},'%') AND hr_authority = #{hr_authority} + 1 OR (#{hr_authority} = 7 AND hr_authority in (6,7));
select * from approval left join hr on hr.hr_code = approval.hr_code where approval.hr_code = #{hr_code}
select * from approval left join hr on hr.hr_code = approval.hr_code where approval.app_id = #{app_id}

SELECT * FROM approval LEFT JOIN hr ON hr.hr_code = approval.boss_code WHERE (approval.boss_code = #{hr_code} AND approval.boss_code_second = 0) OR (approval.boss_code = #{hr_code} OR approval.boss_code_second = #{hr_code}) ORDER BY CASE WHEN approval.app_status = 2 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, approval.app_status;
mapper.update: update approval set app_view = 1 where app_id = #{app_id}
update approval set app_status = 1, app_rejection=#{app_rejection} where app_id = #{app_id}

UPDATE approval SET app_status = CASE WHEN boss_code_second != 0 AND app_id = #{app_id} THEN 3 WHEN boss_code_second = 0 AND app_id = #{app_id} THEN 2 ELSE app_status END, boss_code_second = CASE WHEN boss_code_second = 0 AND app_id = #{app_id} THEN #{boss_code_second} ELSE boss_code_second END, app_view = CASE WHEN app_status != 3 THEN 0 WHEN app_status = 3 THEN 1 END WHERE app_id = #{app_id};

UPDATE hr JOIN approval ON hr.hr_code = approval.hr_code SET hr_pdo = CASE WHEN approval.app_cat = 0 THEN hr.hr_pdo - DATEDIFF(approval.app_dateend, approval.app_datestart) WHEN approval.app_cat = 1 THEN hr.hr_pdo - DATEDIFF(approval.app_dateend, approval.app_datestart) WHEN approval.app_cat = 2 THEN 0 WHEN approval.app_cat = 3 THEN hr.hr_pdo ELSE hr.hr_pdo END, hr_del = CASE WHEN approval.app_cat = 2 THEN 1 ELSE hr_del END WHERE hr.hr_code = (SELECT hr_code FROM approval WHERE app_id = #{app_id});
mapper.select: select app_id, hr_code, app_title, app_datestart, app_dateend from approval where app_status = 3
